titleStmt.title: Englands condition parralelld with Iacobs for [brace] troubles. Salvations. Hopes. Laid open in two sermons, lately preached at Marlborough in Wilts. By Iohn Sedgwick, Batchelour in Divinity and Pastor of the Church at Alphage neere Cripplegate, London.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, John, 1600 or 1601-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for Samuell Gellibrand, at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard
